name: jtschoonhoven.github.io
tagline: Hello world, you've found Jonathan Schoonhoven's public Github page. At right you'll find some projects I've worked on.
body:
# [sql-query-builder](https://github.com/jtschoonhoven/qb)
Another SQL string builder for Node. Optimized for BI & data exploration tools. Supports Postgres, MySQL, Microsoft SQL Server, and SQLite.

- [NPM package](https://www.npmjs.com/package/sql-query-builder)
- [Example UI for a BI application](http://jtschoonhoven.github.io/qb/)

![sql-query-builder](http://i.imgur.com/E5XEE3w.png)

# [ggd3](https://github.com/jtschoonhoven/ggd3)
An open-ended charting framework in D3. Takes [A Layered Grammar of Graphics](http://byrneslab.net/classes/biol607/readings/wickham_layered-grammar.pdf)'s approach for a simple API. Visual cues from Tufte. Work in progress.

![ggd3](http://i.imgur.com/sNz07Ug.png)

# [shapes](https://github.com/jtschoonhoven/shapes)
Draw spirographic shapes in browser with javascript.

- [Demo](http://jtschoonhoven.github.io/shapes/)

![shapes](http://i.imgur.com/OZLZ90v.png)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
